function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertain long-term toll of coronavirus","Impact":"Potential catastrophic effects on health care system and economy","Mitigation":"Research, vaccine development, public health measures","Technologies":"Health monitoring technologies, vaccine development tools, contact tracing apps","People":"General population, healthcare workers, essential workers, vulnerable communities","Owner":"Medical researchers, public health organizations, government"},{"Description":"Impact on workforce and economy","Impact":"Skyrocketing unemployment and stalled economy","Mitigation":"Job creation, economic stimulus, workforce development programs","Technologies":"Online job platforms, remote work technologies, digital skills training","People":"Employers, employees, job seekers, young professionals","Owner":"Government, employers, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Cultural differences in work environment expectations","Impact":"Mismatch between traditional operating norms and indigenous concepts of life, work, and time","Mitigation":"Cultural sensitivity training, flexible work arrangements, community engagement","Technologies":"Collaborative work platforms, remote communication tools, cultural awareness apps","People":"Indigenous communities, organizations operating in indigenous areas, multicultural workforces","Owner":"Employers, community leaders, cultural organizations"}]}
